mapper.select: select * from d_file where check_tag='S001-1' and design_cell_tag='K001-0'
SELECT d.* ,s.store_id ,s.`check_tag` AS s_check_tag FROM d_file d,s_cell s WHERE d.product_id=s.product_id AND d.check_tag='S001-1'
SELECT d.* ,s.store_id FROM d_file d,s_cell s WHERE d.product_id=s.product_id AND d.check_tag='S001-1' AND s.check_tag='S001-1'
select count(1) from s_cell order by id DESC limit 1

SELECT d.*,s.store_id,s.check_tag AS s_check_tag FROM d_file d INNER JOIN s_cell s ON d.product_id=s.product_id WHERE d.check_tag='S001-1'AND d.design_cell_tag='K001-1' AND s.check_tag='S001-0' OR s.check_tag='S001-2'
mapper.update: update D_FILE set design_cell_tag='K001-1' where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM d_file WHERE check_tag='S001-1' AND delete_tag='C001-0'
